snippet.title: A night in Berry - trailer
snippet.description:
France - XVIth century.
The father of Lilith has fallen into a coma. When a healer happens to pass in her village, she decides to grab the opportunity to save him.
A night in Berry is a free game created with Adventure Game Studio. The game features :
- 2 playable characters.
- 800*600 resolution.
- a simple interface (à la Broken Sword)
- 1/2 hour of original music.

The game is available in english and in french.
Download link:
http://www.adventuregamestudio.co.uk/site/games/game/1885/
